title: COMPLETE
description: The promise is mostly or completely fulfilled.

title: IN PROGRESS
description: The promise is in the works or being considered.

title: STALLED
description: Could occur due to inaction by administration or lack of support from legislative branch.

title: BEHIND SCHEDULE
description: No progress, perhaps due to financial limitations, opposition from lawmakers or a change in priorities.

title: INCONCLUSIVE
description: Every promise begins at this level and retains this rating until evidence of progress or proof that it has been shelved.

title: UNSTARTED
description: The promise is accomplished only in part, but has succeeded at least in part consistently with the goal of the promise.
